create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS chat_members (chat_id INT NOT NULL, user_id INT NOT NULL, joined_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (chat_id, user_id), FOREIGN KEY (chat_id) REFERENCES chats(id) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE);

delete.by_user: DELETE FROM chat_members WHERE chat_id = %s AND user_id = %s;

fetch.members_by_chat: SELECT u.id, u.username, u.email FROM chat_members cm JOIN users u ON cm.user_id = u.id WHERE cm.chat_id = %s;
fetch.chats_by_user: SELECT chat_id FROM chat_members WHERE user_id = %s;
fetch.is_member: SELECT 1 FROM chat_members WHERE chat_id = %s AND user_id = %s LIMIT 1;
